languages.text: "Эт{mf|от|а} элантах — т{mf|от|а}, что перв{mf|ым|ой} узнал{mf||а} о приближении Сай'лантреш — одной из тех, кого мон-кай зовут {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}богами Хаоса{/g}. Если бы не он{mf||а}, я все еще обманывалась бы твоими речами о предназначении и истинном грядущем".

traits.locale_text: "Эт{mf|от|а} элантах — т{mf|от|а}, что перв{mf|ым|ой} узнал{mf||а} о приближении Сай'лантреш — одной из тех, кого мон-кай зовут {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}богами Хаоса{/g}. Если бы не он{mf||а}, я все еще обманывалась бы твоими речами о предназначении и истинном грядущем".

languages.text: "This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos Gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."
languages.original_text: "Эт{mf|от|а} элантах — т{mf|от|а}, что перв{mf|ым|ой} узнал{mf||а} о приближении Сай'лантреш — одной из тех, кого мон-кай зовут {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}богами Хаоса{/g}. Если бы не он{mf||а}, я все еще обманывалась бы твоими речами о предназначении и истинном грядущем".

traits.locale_text: "This el'antar was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call Chaos gods. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future. Now that the veil of omissions and evasions has been ripped away... I am calling you to account, Muaran! Tell me, why did you avert our gazes from the true threat, instead directing all of our anger at the mon-keigh?"

"This el'antar was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call Chaos gods. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future. Now that the veil of omissions and evasions has been ripped away... I am calling you to account, Muaran! Tell me, why did you avert our gazes from the true threat, instead directing all of our anger at the mon-keigh?"

"This el'antar was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call Chaos gods. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future. Now that the veil of omissions and evasions has been ripped away... I am calling you to account, Muaran! Tell me, why did you avert our gazes from the true threat, instead directing all of our anger at the mon-keigh?"

"This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

"This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

languages.text: “这个外界人是第一个发现赛·兰斯雷什即将到来的人，猴子们称它为{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌诸神{/g}之一。如果没有{mf|他|她}，我仍然会被你关于命运和真正未来的话语所欺骗。”
languages.original_text: "This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos Gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

traits.locale_text: “这个外界人是第一个发现赛·兰斯雷什即将到来的人，猴子们称它为{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌诸神{/g}之一。如果没有{mf|他|她}，我仍然会被你关于命运和真正未来的话语所欺骗。”

languages.text: 「このエランタはセランスレッシュの襲来をいち早く察知した。モン＝ケイが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の神々{/g}と称しているものだ。エランタがいなければ我は、運命と真の未来、というお前の言葉に依然として騙されていただろう」
languages.original_text: "This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos Gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

traits.locale_text: 「このエランタはセランスレッシュの襲来をいち早く察知した。モン＝ケイが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の神々{/g}と称しているものだ。エランタがいなければ我は、運命と真の未来、というお前の言葉に依然として騙されていただろう」

languages.text: "{mf|Dieser|Diese} Elantach war die erste Person, die das Herannahen von Sai'lanthresh entdeckt hat – eine von denen, die die Chem-Pan-Sey {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos-Götter{/g} nennen. Ohne {mf|ihn|sie} würden mich Eure Worte über Schicksal und die wahre Zukunft immer noch täuschen."
languages.original_text: "This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos Gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Dieser|Diese} Elantach war die erste Person, die das Herannahen von Sai'lanthresh entdeckt hat – eine von denen, die die Chem-Pan-Sey {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaosgötter{/g} nennen. Ohne {mf|ihn|sie} würden mich Eure Worte über Schicksal und die wahre Zukunft immer noch täuschen."

languages.text: « {mf|Cet|Cette} elantach a été la première personne à découvrir la venue de Sai'lanthresh, l'une de ceux que les mon-keigh appellent les {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}dieux du Chaos{/g}. Sans {mf|lui|elle}, je continuerais à croire aux mensonges que vous nous avez racontés sur le destin et le véritable avenir. »
languages.original_text: "This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos Gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Cet|Cette} elantach a été la première personne à découvrir la venue de Sai'lanthresh, l'une de ceux que les mon-keigh appellent les {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}dieux du Chaos{/g}. Sans {mf|lui|elle}, je continuerais à croire à les mensonges que vous nous avez racontés sur le destin et le véritable avenir. »

languages.text: «Est{mf|e|a} elantach fue la primera persona en descubrir la llegada de Sai'lanthresh, una de los que los mon-keigh llaman {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}dioses del Caos{/g}. De no ser por {mf|él|ella}, aún estaría engañada por tus discursos sobre el destino y el auténtico futuro».
languages.original_text: "This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos Gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

traits.locale_text: «Est{mf|e|a} elantach fue la primera persona en descubrir la llegada de Sai'lanthresh, una de los que los mon-keigh llaman {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}dioses del Caos{/g}. De no ser por {mf|él|ella}, aún estaría engañada por tus discursos sobre el destino y el auténtico futuro».

languages.text: "Mon-keighlerin {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos Tanrısı{/g} dediklerinden olan Sai'lanthresh'in gelişini ilk fark eden, bu elantach'tı. O olmasaydı hâlâ kader ve gerçek gelecek hakkındaki laflarına kanacaktım."
languages.original_text: "This elantach was the first person to discover the coming of Sai'lanthresh — one of those whom the mon-keigh call {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos Gods{/g}. Without {mf|him|her}, I would still be deceived by your words about destiny and the true future."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighlerin {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos Tanrısı{/g} dediklerinden olan Sai'lanthresh'in gelişini ilk fark eden, bu elantach'tı. O olmasaydı hâlâ kader ve gerçek gelecek hakkındaki laflarına kanacaktım."
